item.name: Age of Empires III: The Age of Discovery
Betrayal at House on the Hill
Bruges
item.comment: Random crap thrown in a box and called a "game"

item.name: Chronology
item.comment: Fun for a fast/trivia/party type game.

item.name: Clue
item.comment: Had it as a kid

item.name: Colonial: Europe's Empires Overseas
item.comment:
Played the 1st ed. when it came out and hated it. In a 6-player game, we decided to stop playing after 4+ hours with no end in sight.
2nd ed. is fantastic.

item.name: Cows Can't Dance (but they like to be asked)
item.comment: Fun to play with 4-8 year old kids.

item.name: Cows Can't Dance (but they like to be asked)
item.comment: I prefer the artwork in the 1996 Gamewright edition.

item.name: Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game
Dungeons & Dragons: Castle Ravenloft Board Game
Eureka!
item.comment: Fun to play with kids. You don't even have to "let" them win (if you're that kind of person). With the luck/memory aspect they'll be able to beat you on their own (as my 4 year old shows me again and again).

item.name: Face-it
item.comment: Fun to play with my 4 year old.

item.name: Fill 'er Up!
item.comment: This is even worse than Parcheesi and Candy Land. I wouldn't even call this a game. I'd rather punch myself in the genitals than play this again.

item.name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame: Town Square Game
Innovation
item.comment: Brilliant game. I like it more and more with each play.

item.name: Last Call: The Bartender Game
item.comment: Not bad at all. Fun and quick.

item.name: Legacy: The Testament of Duke de Crecy
Lords of Waterdeep: Scoundrels of Skullport
Merchant of Venus
item.comment: Meh.

item.name: Monopoly Junior: Dig 'n Dinos
item.comment: Garbage. Worse than the original.

item.name: Moongha Invaders: Mad Scientists and Atomic Monsters Attack the Earth!
The Naked Brothers Band VIP Concert Tour Game
item.comment: Bad. Even for a kid's game it's bad.

item.name: Oubliette
item.comment: Prototype

item.name: Pachisi
item.comment: I really hate this game...but my 3 year old likes it...and it was a present from grandma.

item.name: The Pillars of the Earth: Expansion Set
Pocket Rockets
item.comment: Fun and quick game to play with kids.

item.name: Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age
Saint Petersburg: New Society & Banquet Expansion
Santy Anno
item.comment: Color blindness made it a bit tough to get through...still playable though.

item.name: Scary Tales: Little Red vs. Pinocchio
Scottish Highland Whisky Race
item.comment: First play (6p) made me want to gouge my eyes out.

item.name: Scripts and Scribes: The Dice Game
Small World: Grand Dames of Small World
item.comment: Very nice expansion.

item.name: Spartacus: A Game of Blood & Treachery
Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs Tundra Orcs
Terra Prime
item.comment:
Played one 2-player game. Meh. I'll try again with 3 or 4.
This is a bitch for color blind people. I can't tell the difference between the gray player and the blue (?) player. Yellow and Green planets both look Green to me. The Brownium and Greenium cubes are very similar as well...especially on the Tech Upgrade cards.
Played a 5 player game. Rating drops from 5.3 to 4.9.

item.name: Tesla vs. Edison: War of Currents
Thurn and Taxis: Power and Glory
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 1 – Team Asia & Legendary Asia
Ticket to Ride: The Card Game
A Touch of Evil: Hero Pack 1
A Touch of Evil: Something Wicked Expansion
A Touch of Evil: The Supernatural Game
Ubongo
item.comment: Being color blind, this is nearly impossible to play. It's fun but I won't try it again.

item.name: Warriors
item.comment: Fairly lame as 2-player. I need to try it again with 3 or 4.

item.name: Zombie Dice
item.comment: Fun for what it is.
